textEditor

Interface UserInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CmdLine, Gui

    public interface UserInterface
extends Observer
    An interface present in the implementation ever since version 2. It allows a transparent switching between the GUI and the command line interface according to user preferences.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface textEditor.Observer

        update
